objects.text:
• Noise Reduction Technology
• Hi-Res Audio & Deep Bass
• Comfortable Foam Ear Cups
• Built-in Microphone

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek promotional design for wireless headphones, combining a modern aesthetic with an eye-catching layout. The background consists of a soft, diagonal dual-tone gradient with abstract radial circles and curve overlays, adding depth and vibrance. A high-quality image of the product dominates the right half, strategically balancing the visual weight. The left side hosts multiple text layers: large, bold title layers (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) introduce the product name; a smaller, clean subtitle (`subheading`) defines its category; a detailed bullet list (`description`) outlines key features. The promotional price (`price`) is bold and prominent, accompanied by a purple call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) with white text. 

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Background: #C3B1E1, #9370DB
- Accent Elements: #E6E6FA, #D8BFD8
- Text: #FFFFFF, #FFF5F5
- CTA Button: #5D3FD3
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of sleek, over-ear headphones in various shades of lavender and purple, giving it a modern and luxurious feel. The primary color is a soft lavender (#C8A2C8), used on the ear cups and headband. Deeper purples such as #7E5A9B appear on the mesh padding and interior, adding richness and depth. Light violet highlights (#E6DAF0) give a glossy sheen, enhancing contrast and dimension. Subtle gradients blend these tones smoothly, while metallic reflections highlight the contours. For advertisement banners, combining these aesthetics with complementary silver (#D3D3D3) or pastel backgrounds will enhance brand elegance and contemporary appeal.
